content: संमित {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Meted, measured out. {@--2@} Of equal measure, extent or value, equal, similar, like, resembling; कांतासंमिततयो पदेशयुजे <ls>K. P. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 16.</ls> {@--3@} As large as, reaching to. {@--4@} Conformable, corresponding, commensurate. {@--5@} Provided or furnished with. {@--6@} Equalized, adapted.
